classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
Pyro Robotics is a set of objects, environment, and libraries for
exploring robotics. Can be used to do very simple control
(like robot.move()), or more complex planning and learning
problems. Comes with a couple of simulators, and works
with a variety of real robots, too.
info.name: Pyro-Robotics
info.platform: Linux, Mac OS X, and Windows
info.summary: A Python-based robotics environment for teaching and research
info.html_description: Pyro Robotics is a set of objects, environment, and libraries for exploring robotics. Can be used to do very simple control (like robot.move()), or more complex planning and learning problems. Comes with a couple of simulators, and works with a variety of real robots, too.
